World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2023 年 12 月 28 日星期四 11:05:36 GMT 120
Gaza in 2024: Signs of more devastation, open-ended occupationThe war aims of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Gaza's Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar look unattainable in 2024, and their fight may consign the Palestinian territory to yet more devastation and an open-ended Israeli occupation. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 11:03:37 GMT EOQBOIYY2VOQ3MXHX4CE4MDRSE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-2024-signs-more-devastation-open-ending-occupation-2023-12-28/Samia Nakhoul世界中东
China's military lashes out at US after breakthrough talksChina's defence ministry lashed out at the United States on Thursday, a week after their top military officials resumed high-level talks, criticising its continued meddling in the Asia Pacific region and saying it maintained a "Cold War" mindset. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:50:14 GMT UJEWN6HLKFODRG32LXNKQXTRJU https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-military-lashes-out-us-after-breakthrough-talks-2023-12-28/Laurie Chen世界
UN report deplores 'rapid deterioration' of rights in West BankA United Nations report published on Thursday deplored what it said was a "rapid deterioration" of human rights in the Israeli-occupied West Bank and urged Israeli authorities to end violence against the Palestinian population there. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 09:39:43 GMT G6C53YS25ZL4BKJ7ZY7NOETXCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-report-deplores-rapid-deterioration-rights-west-bank-2023-12-28/Reuters世界中东
Romania, Bulgaria agree partial Schengen entry with Austria - ministryRomania and Bulgaria have reached an agreement with Austria to join Europe's open-borders Schengen area by air and sea from March 2024, with talks set to continue next year about land borders, the Romanian interior ministry said late on Wednesday. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 09:21:33 GMT WW2XBF43NVMMXOE2QQHWD3ZMXE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/romania-bulgaria-agree-partial-shengen-entry-with-austria-ministry-2023-12-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Islamist rebel commander killed in Ugandan rainforest - armyUganda's army said it killed a commander of a unit of the Islamist rebel Allied Democratic Forces (ADF) blamed for a string of deadly attacks including a massacre at a boarding school. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 09:20:28 GMT VSKK5ORI4NMFZD5VUEHYQ5VZ3A https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/islamist-rebel-commander-killed-ugandan-rainforest-army-2023-12-28/Elias Biryabarema世界非洲
Bulk carrier hits mine in Black Sea, two people injured, Ukraine saysA Panama-flagged bulk carrier that was headed to a River Danube port to load grain hit a Russian mine in the Black Sea on Wednesday, injuring two crew members, Ukrainian officials said on Thursday. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 09:17:56 GMT KQFRQMUIFROL5MAWK4UH2452ME https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bulk-carrier-hits-mine-black-sea-two-people-injured-ukraine-says-2023-12-28/Reuters世界欧洲
China says it won't turn a blind eye to Philippines' repeated 'provocations'China on Thursday said it will not turn a blind eye to repeated "provocations and harassment" by the Philippines, amid heightened tensions over a spate of run-ins in the South China Sea. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 08:45:33 GMT 6C6CQH7NFRNN7KYWIA26LTXWJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-it-wont-turn-blind-eye-philippines-repeated-pro Vocations-2023-12-28/Laurie Chen世界亚太地区
South Korea police defend probe of 'Parasite' actor who was found deadThe head of the district police force that investigated South Korean actor Lee Sun-kyun over allegations of illegal drug use on Thursday defended the tough questioning of him before he was found dead. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 08:40:37 GMT GR57JRY2PBL37LYDTZD6URDLGY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-police-defend-probe-parasite-actor-who-was-found-dead-2023-12-28/Jack Kim, Jimin Jung世界亚太地区
Bangladesh garment factories fire workers after protests, unions sayBangladesh garment factories have fired hundreds of workers since protests in October demanding higher wages, three labour unions representing half a million workers told Reuters this week, while many others are on the run fearing arrest. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 08:29:26 GMT OSVER2HCTBMY5P2BSLGKUZJVLY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-garment-factories-fire-workers-after-protests-unions-say-2023-12-28/Ruma Paul, Kanjyik Ghosh世界亚太地区
Ukraine's frontline children yearn for return to classroomSitting alone in her bedroom, Ukrainian third-grader Arina Herasymova cuts an image of loneliness as she stares at her teacher and classmates on a screen. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 08:04:32 GMT S7SQMRQKCROQ5BOF63HAPCVKQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-frontline-children-yearn-return-classroom-2023-12-28/Vitalii Hnidyi, Thomas Peter世界欧洲
China decries Taiwan for 'hyping up' military threat, sends warplanesChina's defence ministry accused Taiwan's government on Thursday of deliberately "hyping up" a military threat from China for electoral gain ahead of elections on the island in just over two weeks' time, but again sent warplanes into the Taiwan Strait. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 07:30:00 GMT 3CPCHC2SNBLYXPLLRAFQWQISJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-taiwan-is-hyping-up-military-threat-its-own-gain-2023-12-28/Laurie Chen, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
